mapper.select: select * from stu_status where sid=#{sid} order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into stu_status (pkid, sid, create_date, status, note) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
